elements.name: POST: create new user with firstName and lastName value length boundaries

steps.name: user prepare "required fields" body for "POST" method with:
user send a "POST" request to the "create" endpoint

the response body should contain "BODY_NOT_VALID", with message "Path `firstName` (`averylongusernameintheearthandgalaxy`) is longer than the maximum allowed length (30)." and "Path `lastName` (`averylongusernameintheearthandgalaxy`) is longer than the maximum allowed length (30)."

arguments.val: "Path `firstName` (`averylongusernameintheearthandgalaxy`) is longer than the maximum allowed length (30)."
"Path `lastName` (`averylongusernameintheearthandgalaxy`) is longer than the maximum allowed length (30)."

steps.name: all request header is properly setup

elements.name: POST: create new user with firstName and lastName value length boundaries

steps.name: user prepare "required fields" body for "POST" method with:
user send a "POST" request to the "create" endpoint

the response body should contain "BODY_NOT_VALID", with message "Path `firstName` (`a`) is shorter than the minimum allowed length (2)." and "Path `lastName` (`a`) is shorter than the minimum allowed length (2)."

arguments.val: "Path `firstName` (`a`) is shorter than the minimum allowed length (2)."
"Path `lastName` (`a`) is shorter than the minimum allowed length (2)."
